description: Andrew Scott stars as a grifter who's always ready to swindle, seduce or murder in a new eight-part miniseries based on 1955 novel. Ripley combines a bold narrative with visual surprises throughout.
title: Netflix's stylish 'Ripley' stretches the grift — and the tension — to the max

description: There are the obvious options (Soundgarden, Bonnie Tyler and Pink Floyd,) plus some celestially coded jams that are unexpectedly fitting for your viewing adventures.
title: The perfect celestial soundtrack to the total solar eclipse

description: Over 30 million people will be within the path of totality for Monday's solar eclipse as it crosses the U.S. from Texas to Maine. Here's what you need to know to safely enjoy the celestial spectacle.
title: What you need to know to watch Monday's total solar eclipse

title: What you need to know to watch Monday's total solar eclipse

description: Set in France, Allen's latest film covers familiar territory, including an adulterous romance, a premeditated murder and a darkly cynical consideration of the role that luck plays in human affairs.
title: 'Coup de Chance' is a typical Woody Allen film — with one appalling final detail
